rows.name: help_text
rows.value:
Some of the EFM math puzzles provide excellent rich tasks. 

The given puzzle is not the end of the journey  â€“ encourage your students to come up with new versions or variations of the puzzle and see about solving those.

rows.name: ideas_text
rows.value:
Instead of asking your students to do basic calculations, have them practice those same skills in more engaging ways that invite discussion and exploration. Using open problems invites experimentation and exploration, rather than simple calculational tasks.

Numbers in order - Consecutive Numbers - 1-4

Shape puzzles - Pattern Blocks - Hexagons, Triangles
Finding the Pieces 1-5

Difference Pyramids - 6 & 10
Equal Sums - 1-4
Fill in the Blanks - 1-5
Sum Pyramids - 1-5
